export default component.exports

  var _c = _vm._self._c || _h
  return _c(
    "div",
    { class: ["todo-item", _vm.todoitem.completed ? "completed" : ""] },
    [
      _vm._ssrNode(
        "<input" +
          _vm._ssrAttr("id", _vm.todoitem.id) +
          ' type="checkbox"' +
          _vm._ssrAttr(
            "checked",
            Array.isArray(_vm.todoitem.completed)
              ? _vm._i(_vm.todoitem.completed, null) > -1
              : _vm.todoitem.completed
